Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-49214 affecting package haproxy for versions less than 2.4.24-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-49214 affecting package haproxy for versions less than 2.4.24-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package haproxy is earlier than 2.4.24-1, affected by CVE-2024-49214
